commands_raw:
Belethara: Hello... 
---
Belethara: May I help you?

?> My name is Dalian I am here investigating the murder -> pre-choices
name: start

commands_raw:
?> Where is the body? -> body
?> Do you know the name of the victim? -> name
?> Did anyone hear anything? -> hear
?> Leave
name: choices

commands_raw:
Belethara: Ahh... Yes that loud man downstairs.
---
Belethara: What would you like to know?

-> choices
name: pre-choices

commands_raw:
Belethara: I found the body first in the morning at around 8:12 AM. Called the police and waited here for someone to arrive. 
signal(set,bodyDiscoveredTimeKnown,true) 
---
Belethara: However the cleaning lady named Nabella, was supposed to clean all the rooms at 7:30 AM.
---
Belethara: I haven't confronted her about the fact, but I'm very mad at her. These servants should learn their place.

-> choices
name: hear

commands_raw:
Belethara: He preffered to be referred as Mr. S, but he wrote down Solomon on the receipt.
---
Belethara: He was a very weird little fella, I can tell you that. One night he said the walls talked to him. I told him it was just the plumbing.
signal(set,clueNameSolomon,true)
-> choices
name: name

commands_raw:
Belethara: Right where you'd expect it. The bottom floor, crumpled like a marionette with it's strings cut.
---
Belethara: He died in his aparment, I locked the door so nobody would come in.
---
Belethara: This is the key to his aparment.
signal(set,keyToBody, true)
---
She hands you over the key
---
Belethara: I haven't touched anything down there.
---
Dalian: After the body investiagtion I'll be talking to the suspects.
---
Belethara: No problem.

-> choices
name: body
